messages.subject: RE: [SHQ_Spy_Division] What happened to Kondo, Hijikata, etc children
messages.msgSnippet: Kondo s first adopted son, Shuuhei, died in the war, I think. His 2nd adopted son-- his nephew by blood, Yuugoro-- married Kondou s real daughter Tama. The
messages.messageBody:
Kondo's first adopted son, Shuuhei, died in the war, I think. His 2nd
adopted son-- his nephew by blood, Yuugoro-- married Kondou's "real"
daughter Tama. The current descendant of the Miyagawa/Kondo line is Miyagawa
Toyoji, descended from Kondo's brother Miyagawa Otogoro. Hijikata had no
children (they say, but it's not known for sure), but descendants of his
siblings survive. I believe the same goes for Okita.

--M.

messages.subject: What happened to Kondo, Hijikata, etc children
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, I ve been trying to find out what happened to Kondo s daughter & Hijikata or Okita children if they had any.  I ve look online but can t find anything.  Do
messages.messageBody:
Hi,
I've been trying to find out what happened to Kondo's daughter &
Hijikata or Okita children if they had any. I've look online but can't
find anything. Do you know?

Thanks
Megumi-San
